pullrequest.title: Create regression test that builds example plugins (part of #951)

content.raw: This test falls under the category of regression, which is fine to me but I would like to be able to run (or exclude) them separately using a regexp. What about renaming them to just ```EXAMPLE_``` or something like this?
content.html: This test falls under the category of regression, which is fine to me but I would like to be able to run (or exclude) them separately using a regexp. What about renaming them to just EXAMPLE_ or something like this?
